verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Piling of more wealth has kept you heedless.
verse.verse_3: Yes, soon you will come to know.
verse.verse_4: Again, yes, soon you will come to know.
verse.verse_5: Yes, if you would have known with knowledge of certainty, you would not have loved wealth.
verse.verse_6: Undoubtedly, you shall necessarily, see Hell.
verse.verse_7: Then again, undoubtedly, you shall necessarily see it with the eye of certainty.
verse.verse_8: Then, undoubtedly, you shall surely be asked about the favours.
